highlights: Implemented a Python-based data collection pipeline using the NewsAPI REST API to programmatically retrieve and aggregate news articles based on keyword, source, and popularity filters.
Processed and normalized JSON API responses into structured tabular datasets with Pandas to support downstream analysis and reuse.
Designed configurable request workflows with headers, query parameters, and pagination handling to demonstrate secure and flexible API consumption patterns.
Exported cleaned news data to CSV format, enabling integration with analytics, reporting, or machine learning pipelines.
